about_the_game:
Fertility, Crime, and Economy will be a survival strategy game. In the game, you will serve as the governor of Alva Province in the United Provinces of Vespuccia, striving to increase the precarious birthrate by implementing various policies, while also balancing with reducing crime rates and promoting economic development. Will you choose to take risks of financial and ethical deficits to drive technological advancement, adopt policies to influence public opinion gradually, or enforce strict regulations, such as - banning abortions?

The content of the demo version is currently relatively thin. Future updates will gradually enhance by providing different branches and endings and introducing features such as emergencies and field investigations. The governor will be able to step out of the office, engage in dialogue with residents, and have a more diverse means of influence (and self-rescue). We are collaborating with scholars in the fields of political science and sociology to ensure the content and data are as realistic as possible.

The text content is undergoing proofreading and is expected to be updated within two weeks.

content_descriptors.notes: Contents included (but not limited to) sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, self-harm, violence, illegal activities, and general immoral behaviours may be mentioned, most in the form of texts, some in the form of images.
